column2: "A new Matter Board has formed. This is evidence that your actions have had favorable consequences."
"I and We must express our gratitude."
"We know that what we request of you is difficult."
"And yet, you have exceeded our expectations. I must thank you."
"Forgive me for having to depend on you."

"Lillipans, from the planet Lillipa...
Back when I was alive, that planet hadn't even been discovered yet."
"The civilization that originally existed on Lillipa was apparently destroyed a long time ago, but it seems that the Lillipans survived."
"...Well, in any case, the Lillipans are so fluffy. I just want to touch them! It's such a shame that I don't have a body!"
"Joking aside, I guess this means that we can interact with the Lillipans as well as the Dragonkin now."
"Verbal communication might be difficult, but Fourier should be able to help out with that."
"Well then, it looks like we should return to Naberius' record."
